nodes.text: Jurio was a planet in the Jurio system, a star system in the Corva sector of the Outer Rim Territories. that came under the control of the Sith Empire by the time of the Great Galactic War between the Empire and the Galactic Republic. Jurio was eventually granted Imperial governance sometime before 3666 BBY, allowing the Imperial Captain Adronik Hyllus to marry a Human woman native to Jurio. In 3666 BBY, the two had a son whom they named Vector on Jurio. During his career, intelligence operative Rane Kovach carried out an assignment on Jurio at the request of Theron Shan of the Republic Strategic Information Service; Kovach was tasked with infiltrating dissident groups and fomenting revolution while minimizing casualties.
